pageTitle: Itinerary for Saturday, November 17, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Port Moresby, Papua New Guinea

12:10 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Prime Minister of Malaysia Mahathir bin Mohamad.

Putrajaya Room, Ground Floor
Stanley Hotel

Notes for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will host a meeting with Pacific Islands leaders.

Room 205, Second Floor
International Conference Centre

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

2:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the APEC Leaders’ Arrival.

Lobby, Ground Floor
APEC Haus

Note for media:

    • Pooled coverage

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an APEC Leaders’ Official Photograph.

Terrace, First Floor
APEC Haus

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a Leaders’ Dialogue with the APEC Business Advisory Council.

Session Room, Ground Floor
APEC Haus

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity

4:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a dialogue with Pacific Islands leaders.

Closed to media.

7:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in the Leaders’ Arrival for the APEC Gala Dinner.

Ground Floor
Hilton Port Moresby Hotel

Note for media:

    • Pooled coverage

8:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an APEC Leaders’ Official Photograph.

Outside Terrace, Ground Floor
Hilton Port Moresby Hotel

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity

8:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the APEC Gala Dinner.

Ballroom, First Floor
Hilton Port Moresby Hotel

Note for media:

    • Pooled photo opportunity
